0001 function graph = empty_graph(graph, compind, c1, c2);
0002 
0003 % Remove all members of cluster C1 or cluster C2 from component COMPIND of
0004 % GRAPH
0005 
0006 if compind < 0
0007  removeind = find(graph.z == c1 | graph.z == c2);
0008 else
0009   removeind = find(graph.components{compind}.z == c1 | ...
0010          graph.components{compind}.z == c2  );
0011 end
0012 
0013 graph.z(removeind) = -1;
0014 
0015 includeind = setdiff(1:size(graph.adj,1), removeind);
0016 graph.adj = graph.adj(includeind, includeind);
0017 graph.W = graph.W(includeind, includeind);
0018 graph.objcount = graph.objcount - length(removeind);
